headlines.description: Spaniard Gerard Deulofeu bagged a hat-trick as Watford hammered lowly Cardiff City 5-1 on Friday to move up to seventh place in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deulofeu hat-trick fires Watford to win at Cardiff

video.headline: Cardiff 1-5 Watford: Deulofeu rips apart Bluebirds

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights (Cardiff 1-4 Watford: Deulofeu rips apart Bluebirds) 2019/02/22 US ONLY

headlines.description: Fulham fell deeper into relegation trouble with a 3-1 Premier League defeat by West Ham United at London Stadium on Friday.

video.headline: West Ham 3-1 Fulham: Hammers deepen Fulham's woes

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights (West Ham 3-1 Fulham: Hammers deepen Fulham's woes) 2019/02/22 US ONLY
